name: FALL BALL (P B Giridharahn)
description:
Fall Ball is an endless physics based runner.

The player needs to move a rolling ball and try to weave its way through the obstacles and ahead without edging off the edge. The player is trying to manipulate the ball’s position, by moving the whole table from left to right and vice-versa, all through just one button 

Controls

- Hold space bar to tilt

- Double Tap space bar to switch direction of Tilt
